text: 5.31: FG 2.33-34; 3.15; Ef 1.20; Fi 2.9; Hi 2.10; 12.2Fhe Bakɨme ana khavgiap, ana ndiga ndav, ana ndim won guva haren fagi. Ana ntigem tuavar nza khɨvi guma kav, ana vhɨra taagia nza ndi guma ki. Ana vhɨra nza Isreriŋ, ana nzan kurkurarga, nza ndavi domdorɨrga, ana nza fhum muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi, ana nta vhɨzɨv, nta ndɨkndɨgɨ tharga.
